description_text:
ssn3336 & 3340

I have yet to receive 3 of the 4 quick releases I ordered a long time ago.
I need a refund for 3 of them. I'm not waiting any longer, they aren't
going to be shipped. The stupid tracker link shows them in a warehouse for
6 days sitting there. I don't care. This happened before. Refund my money

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8712 中
